def has_emails_to_check(computer: item):
    # Function to check if there are emails to be checked on the computer
    symbol have_email=exists mouse: item : is_mouse(mouse) and facing_char(char, computer)
    return have_email

behavior read_email(computer: item):
    body:
        achieve facing_char(char, computer)
        # Ensure the character is facing the computer to read emails

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind computer: item where:
            is_computer(computer) and facing_char(char, computer)
        # Select the computer the character is facing

        read_email(computer)
        # Read emails on the computer

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind computer: item where:
            is_computer(computer)
        # Select the computer

        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair)
        # Select the chair

        bind mouse: item where:
            is_mouse(mouse)
        # Select the mouse
        
        assert is_on(computer)
        # The computer is turned on
        assert on_char(char, chair)
        # The robot is sitting on the chair
        assert facing_char(char, computer)
        # The robot is facing the computer
        assert close_char(char, mouse)
        # The robot is close to the mouse

        read(computer)
        # The expected behavior to check email

def email_opened_on_screen(computer:item):
    symbol email_opened=exists screen: item : is_cpuscreen(screen) and facing(screen, computer) and 
visited(screen)
    return email_opened

behavior check_email_on_computer(computer:item):
    body:
        if not email_opened_on_screen(computer):
            observe(computer, "Check if email is open on screen")
        achieve facing_char(char, computer)
        read(computer)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind computer: item where:
            is_computer(computer) and id[computer]==417
        check_email_on_computer(computer)
